original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st):  988 Inmates have received presidential pardons, this is in line with the Vesak Poya Day.
Inmates who were unable to pay their fines and those who have been imprisoned for over 18 years were among the 988 inmates who received the presidential pardon.
Meanwhile, on the occasion of Vesak Poya Day, prison inmates have been given a special opportunity today and tomorrow to see visitors.
More than 50 aftershocks shake Japan as earthquake kills one
World Health Organization declareS that Covid-19 no longer represents a “global health emergency”
